system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user gains +1 DEF and SPATK stage for 5 activations, and ends their activation. If the weather is Sun, the user Sets-Up and resolves Solar Beam on the same activation. 
Resolution: On their next activation, they attack with and resolve Solar Beam. If the weather is not Sun or Clear, Solar Beam's Power is reduced by 50%.
